text: The Harwich Formation is a geological formation found in the London Basin of southeastern England. It is Ypresian (early Eocene) in age. It lies unconformably on the Lambeth Group over most of its extent, but may overlie either the Thanet Formation or the Chalk Group to the south. It is overlain by the London Clay Formation. ==References== Category:Geology of London Category:Paleogene England Category:Geologic formations of England
title: Harwich Formation
